root: ^"I’m glad that you came to see the showcase of the new artificial arm! I see that you’ve already bought yourself one. Do you like it?"

c-0: ^“It feels like it’s my own arm, except that it’s much stronger than my other natural arm.”
^“I’m glad that you like it! You should also check out the other products at the cybernetics store and while you’re at it, go have a look at the “I Love Robots” store!”
